Posts.Content: Apr 12, 2012 12:46AM GreenEyes57 wrote: I had a uni mx in 10/11. On 3/26/12 I had my "healthy" breast removed and TEs inserted. I am a worrier. I found my cancer. Going forward with a plan of mammograms(which are a joke with ILC) and MRIs - just didn't feel right for me. Anything to increase my odds. I have a busy life and I want to get back to it. My healthy breast was beautiful- but it was out to kill me. Also the issue of symmetry was very important.
